name: Danger Close Dice!
description:
Danger Close Dice is an arena combat game where you only have one move - Roll the dice. Waves of belligerent, heavily-armed chicken advance on your position, and you must jump behind, between, and over incoming artillery fire, anti-tank homing rockets and bomb-vest-equipped-roosters to avoid getting knocked off the map, into the void.

How to Play

  • Click and drag left mouse button (LMB) to aim your die
  • Release LMB to roll the die. (To prevent spam clicking, throws must go a minimum distance)
    • Every 3 rolls, you get a bonus effect based on your roll (See appendix)
  • It's okay if you get hit by an explosion, just don't fall off the arena!
  • Kill all the enemies in the map to trigger the next wave. Some enemies like to hide in corners.
  • There are ~16 waves, you win if you beat them all!

Tips

  • Play with headphones! The music layers build as you advance past waves 3,6, and 9!
  • Homing rockets can be redirected, so can artillery fire ... explosives will damage your enemies too!

Appendix 1 - Dice Combos & Effects

  • TRIPLE (eg. 1,1,1) : Huge AOE
  • Sum to 11 : Instakill nearest enemy (Crit!) and mini-AOE
  • Sum <= 12  : Small AOE
  • Sum >12 : Big AOE

Appendix 2 - Credits

  • Awesome chiptune sound effects from https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style
  •  Cute input prompt icons from https://kenney.nl/assets/input-prompts-pixel-16
  • Music made by me & my Arturia
